casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kenneth William ROBERSON. No. 707P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 19, 2006. Michael Nifong, District Attorney, for State. Winifred H. Dillon, Raleigh, for Roberson.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of December 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion for Stay Dissolved by order of the Court in conference this the 19th day of December 2006."
